pageContext.claim: “With the economy, had the previous administration in its own form, in a different form, or let's put it, had the Democrats won -- instead of being almost 50% up, they would have been 50% down, because the United States was heading in a very bad direction.”
pageContext.analysis: The economy that Trump inherited was on an upward swing under Obama, so it's ridiculous to say it would have fallen dramatically if a Democrat had been elected.
